markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs=""
>
[Nightmare Cudgel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=890)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from polished wood, this seemingly mundane _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)_ comes with a red leather strap near the handle. The mere sight of the cudgel in a guard's hand fills prisoners with dread. Good creatures are [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while carrying, wielding, or wearing this item crafted by the sea-witches.

<document level="2" id="action-667" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Nightmare Cudgel
